title: Type - Vesting Schedule Relative Trigger
description: Describes a vesting condition satisfied when a period of time, relative to another vesting condition, has elapsed.

period_days.description: The span of time that must have elapsed since the condition relative_to_condition_id occurred for this condition to trigger. For weeks or "ideal" years (365 days), use VestingPeriodInDays. For calendar years use VestingPeriodInMonths.

period_months.description: The span of time that must have elapsed since the condition relative_to_condition_id occurred for this condition to trigger. For weeks or "ideal" years (365 days), use VestingPeriodInDays. For calendar years use VestingPeriodInMonths.

relative_to_condition_id.description: Reference to the vesting condition ID to which the period is relative
